summary: Trapped in a lab and stuck in a time loop, a disoriented couple fends off masked raiders while harboring a new energy source that could save humanity.
cast: Robbie Amell|Rachael Taylor|Shaun Benson|Gray Powell|Jacob Neayem|Adam Butcher|Tantoo Cardinal|Nicolas Van Burek|Jamie Spilchuk
keywords: time loop|trapped in a time loop|face spattered with blood|faked death|cyanide gas
title: ARQ
